fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Every even night, attack a player, plus an additional one for every hanged Town role.
- Frame a player at night.
- Read into a player during the day, learning whether or not they are a member of the Town or not. 2 Uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players targeting player b will visit player c.
- Every time the host makes a host error, you are informed of exactly what happened. You may then gain one use of your choice of the following: a Basic attack, a Basic autovest, or a vote that counts as three.
- Can't use your abilities in conjunction

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose the game.
